bug.author: amitnativ
bug.description: Hi. the utility looks great. however, I was unable to view the mask saved to the *.json file. I tried running labelme_json_to_dataset , but got the following messege: 'labelme_draw_json' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I ran the anaconda installation and the GUI works fine. Thanks

comments.comment: hello, I meet the same problem with you, have you solved the problem?
Do you run on Windows? Actually, I've never run labelme on Windows, because I only have mac or Ubuntu os.
